Group

A Group is a layout component which arranges its children horizontally. (Basically it's a flexbox with flex-direction set to row).

<Group gap="xl">
  <Button>Groucho</Button>
  <Button>Chico</Button>
  <Button>Harpo</Button>
  <Button>Zeppo</Button>
</Group>

Properties

The Group component has no special properties of its own. However, like all layout components, it accepts both the standard Dolmen 'flex props' properies as well as the standard HTML element properties.
